item.title: 8 Businesses You Can Add To Your POS Business
item.description: POS business is arguably the most popular financial business in Nigeria. It has found its way into every nigerian street and district; from the streets of Ikeja — home to the biggest technology hub in West Africa (porpularly called Computer Village) to the most remote rural areas of Northern Nigeria.

item.title: When To Choose A Static Website Over A Dynamic Website And Why You Should
item.description: Websites can be built using a variety of languages; programming, markup, and markdown languages. A static website is the most basic form of website.

item.title: Free Static Website Hosting with WordPress, Namecheap, and Github Pages
item.description: In this article, I will show you how to generate static websites using WordPress and how you can host and plug them to a custom domain for free on Github Pages.

item.title: What is Abeg Naira? And How Does it Measure Up To The Naira?
item.description: Abeg is leveraging well its sponsorship deal with Big Brother Naija S6. Abeg Naira is the official in-house currency of the housemates.

item.title: Nigerians Continue To Lament Incessant Defamation From Loan Apps
item.description: The concept of being able to access collateral-free loans by just downloading an app seems incredible to many Nigerians — This reality has effectively made loan apps the most notable invention of the fastest-growing sector in the tech industry in Nigeria; Fintech.

item.title: 2 Clever Tips That Will Deliver You From Quack Website Designers.
item.description: The industry is now oversaturated with quacks, as any Monkey with a laptop and mobile internet access can easily pass for a website designer.

item.title: How To Handle Clients That Won't Pay Your Balance
item.description: This article would help you to better manage stubborn clients who do not always want to pay your balance.
